name: Project Gemini (vicksonzero)
description:
Project-Gemini It's dangerous to go alone. Share this GEM!

Project-Gemini is an asymmetric co-op shoot'em up game where you share control of a powerful Gem that grows.

Jam Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/project-gemini-0

YouTube:

Controls
  • Move Player 1: W/A/S/D
  • Move Player 2: Arrows
  • Transfer Gem: Spacebar

This time you can rebind the keys! (using Unity Input System)

How to play
  • Survive through many waves of enemies and reach the end of the level.
  • Feed the Gem with Bits to upgrade.
  • Players can revive 10 seconds after being hit, don't die together!
GGJ Diversifiers

Don’t go alone, take THIS (Sponsored by Unity) - The GGJ is all about people coming together, sharing ideas, and making them a reality. Create a game about people or things coming together that includes a unique focal item: what is "this"?

Keys to Success - Make a multiplayer game where each player uses only one keyboard key to control some aspect of the game.

GAG10 - Celebrate the 10th anniversary of http://www.gameaccessibilityguidelines.com by implementing 10 guidelines from the site.
